actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to extend the delay in making any adjustment in the price support level for milk and to extend the time for conducting referenda with respect to the national marketing quotas for wheat and upland cotton.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to extend the existing price support level for milk through March 31, 1982. Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to extend the deadlines for wheat and upland cotton marketing quota referendums until March 31, 1982.

titles.title: A bill to extend the delay in making any adjustment in the price support level for milk and to extend the time for conducting referenda with respect to the national marketing quotas for wheat and upland cotton.
